Class PageModel

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.xform.WidgetModelElement

public class PageModel
extends WidgetModelElement

This class forms the root element of the widgets within a page.

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved
